data.eml:eml: New species of the Genus Haliclona (Haplosclerida: Chalinidae) from Korea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kim, Hyung June, Lee, Sang-Hui, Kang, Dong Won (2017): New species of the Genus Haliclona (Haplosclerida: Chalinidae) from Korea. Zootaxa 4347 (1): 181-186, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4347.1.11
